Name: LUXAR
About the game: In LUXAR, you control an extra-terrestrial luminescent organic entity that has just been born and must pass its first survival trials to show its adult peers that it deserves to grow among them. It will have to cross 16 dark and hostile sectors with labyrinth-shaped alien architectures populated by toxic substances, obstacles, patrol drones and mechanisms of all kinds. You are its only chance to make it happen...
Meta Title: LUXAR: Jan 8, 2020, Koalabs and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on LUXAR? Check out the release date (Jan 8, 2020), developer insights from Koalabs, and a complete game summary.
